name: raycast-nostion-todo
title: Raycast Notion To-Do
description: Manage to-do's in notion from Raycast
author: mtmarctoni

commands.name: add-todo
commands.title: Add Todo
commands.subtitle: Add a todo to Notion
commands.description: Add a personal or work todo to Notion

commands.name: get-todos
commands.title: Get All Todos
commands.subtitle: View all todos from Notion
commands.description: Get all personal and work todos from Notion

commands.name: quick-add-todo
commands.title: Quick Add Todo with AI
commands.subtitle: AI-powered todo creation
commands.description: Use natural language to quickly create a todo with AI assistance

arguments.name: text
arguments.placeholder: e.g., Buy groceries tomorrow, high priority

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
